title: Open ankle fracture-dislocation
stem: 30M motorcycle crash. Grossly deformed ankle, bleeding wound, diminished pulses initially. X-rays provided.
expected_points: Imaging (ankle + tib/fib), CT if needed after reduction
Operative plan: debridement, stabilisation strategy, staged fixation
Complications: infection, nonunion, stiffness, arthritis, neurovascular compromise
